department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Tender for the purchase of freefall helmets to be delivered to various regions in British Columbia.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title:
Freefall Helmets

## Solicitation Number :
WS4209845341

## Contract Identifier:
WS4209845341 - Doc4234551850

## Notice Type:
Request for Proposal - Demande de propositions


### Summary

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to provide freefall helmets for military personnel. The contract is governed by the tendering rules and regulations of the Government of Canada.

### Key Details
- **UNSPSC Code:** 46182300 - Fall protection and rescue equipment
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Regions of Opportunity:** British Columbia, Colombie-Britannique

### Tender Status
- **Publication Date:** September 29, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** November 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
- **Contract Duration:** Not specified

### Contracting Entity Information
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Points of Contact
- Christine Cress (SPAC/PSPC) - christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Resources
- [Official Request for Proposal](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17590934?extsite=MTc1OTA5MzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Note to Suppliers:**
Please ensure you review the official request for proposal (RFP) carefully and submit your proposal before the tender closing date to avoid disqualification. The tender documents may be downloaded from the Government of Canada's electronic tendering system. If you have any queries or need assistance, please contact the contracting authority.  #government_tender #ouncement # ContractingEntitiDeAnnounced
